pages.text: The $(mob)Magma Cube$() is a monster found in the $(thing)Nether$(). It moves by making sucessive jumps and deals damage on contact.$(p)Like $(l:minecraft_slime)$(mob)Slimes$(), it comes in different sizes and will split up into several smaller $(mob)Magma Cubes$() on death. It is also immune to fire.
The smallest $(mob)Magma Cubes$() drop $(item)Magma Cream$() on death. It can be used to craft $(item)Potions of Fire Resistance$(), which are especially useful in the $(thing)Nether$().
